name: DR. WEED GASTER
description:
It's Doctor Wingding Gaster...

But In My Way..

It's..

DR. WEED GASTER!

-Ottotinne (2016)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Dr. Weed Gaster! (On itch.io.)  

Over 7 Modes to Play and have fun with!

  • Language Support! (English, Russian)
  • Experience the story in NORMAL , MLG and PACIFIST modes!
  • Test yourself and try to reach the highest score in ENDLESS!
  • Go CO-OP with your m8 and play many modes together! Online play not included.
  • Train yourself in TRAINING! and win all dem battlez. ;)
  • Try wacky modifiers and test yourself in CHALLENGES!
  • Feeling Dank? try the EXTRA MEMES MODE!
  • MLG! (why not?)
  • Many Secrets to find... Can you find 'em all?
Join our Discord Server m8!
In the Server You can:
  • See Exclusive Teasers!
  • Chat with me and the other members.
  • Exclusive Game Betas ;)
  • Meme. xD
  • Become a member of our memer alliance?

Undertale Is By Toby Fox. I DO NOT OWN UNDERTALE.

But i actually do have the Game on my Computer! :D  

You can also find this page on GAMEJOLT, that's where we post our game updates, etc. :)
